GameModelFactory Class Reference

GameModelFactory class is the factory class handling the creation of 3 types of major game models namely GamePlayer,GameObstacle,GameCrateBox. More...

#include <GameModelFactory.h>

Detailed Description

GameModelFactory class is the factory class handling the creation of 3 types of major game models namely GamePlayer,GameObstacle,GameCrateBox.
